mapper.insert: insert into MOTEL_TB (MOTEL_NUM, MOTEL_TYPE, MOTEL_CATEGORY, MOTEL_PEOPLE, MOTEL_ROOM, MOTEL_BATHROOM, MOTEL_NATION_EN, MOTEL_NATION_KO, MOTEL_CITY_EN, MOTEL_CITY_KO, MOTEL_ADDRESS, MOTEL_INTRO, MOTEL_TITLE, MOTEL_PRICE ) values (MOTEL_TB_SEQ.nextval, #{motel_type}, #{motel_category}, #{motel_people}, #{motel_room}, #{motel_bathroom}, #{motel_nation_en}, #{motel_nation_ko}, #{motel_city_en}, #{motel_city_ko}, #{motel_address}, #{motel_intro}, #{motel_title}, #{motel_price})
